item.title: Why Self-governance Training Is the Most Important Training You’ll Ever Receive
item.description: I just finished Level 1 Training with the Center for Self-Governance. While I have a long way to go to complete the training, I can tell you I needed this. Bad. What I Didn’t Know I Didn’t Know It’s not that I was stupid before. And some of the political action I’ve been doing my whole adult life was affective, I learned. The problem is, I didn’t know whether or not it was effective.
